document_api_meta.title: Get Creator Profile
document_api_meta.env_desc: This API gets the creator profile information.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The creator access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 1. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a362dccb8030ea6f98c) to get creator access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^avatar
response_param.desc: Data associated with the TikTok creator's profile avatar.

response_param.name: ^^width
response_param.desc: The avatar image width in pixels.

response_param.name: ^^height
response_param.desc: The avatar image height in pixels.

response_param.name: ^^url
response_param.desc: The URL for the TikTok creator's avatar image file.

response_param.name: ^selection_region
response_param.desc: The regions in which the creator is eligible to promote products in showcases, videos, and live streams.

response_param.name: ^register_region
response_param.desc: The region in which the creator's TikTok account is registered.

response_param.name: ^seller_type
response_param.desc:
If the creator is also also has a TikTok Shop seller account, the seller type of the creator. This is an enumerated type with values:
- CROSS_BORDER
- LOCAL

response_param.name: ^permissions
response_param.desc:
A list of product promotion permissions for the creator. The list can include zero or more of the following permissions:
- LIVE_STREAM_PERMISSION
- SELF_SALE_PERMISSION
- ADD_AFFILIATE_PERMISSION

response_param.name: ^user_type
response_param.desc:
The creator's user type. This is an enumerated type with values:
- TIKTOK_SHOP_OFFICIAL_ACCOUNT
- TIKTOK_MARKETING_ACCOUNT
- TIKTOK_SHOP_CREATOR

error_code_list.msg: no sale region error; detail: creator has no sale region.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to access your TikTok Shop Affiliate information, including creator profile, live room metrics, and products added/sold.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to access your TikTok Shop Affiliate information, including creator profile, live room metrics, and products added/sold.
